pullRequest.title: [RW-4345][risk=no] Fix error in account creation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes issue where clicking 'Next' after filling out the account creation form, screen goes blank.

PR checklist

 This PR meets the Acceptance Criteria in the JIRA story
 The JIRA story has been moved to Dev Review
 I have run and tested this change locally

nodes.bodyText: do we need null check for institutionalAffiliations?
